TopicTitle: Replica Juno I with Explorer I

Articles.Content:
So, I built a replica that's pretty accurate, but the real accurate part was the flight. The first stage didn't stop burning (because they couldn't re-ignite engines) and then I used the solid boosters on the explorer to get it into its final orbit, which was higher than i expected, measuring at 1000 KM by 900KM.
